name: Once on the Moon
description:
Hello all
don't pass by and try to play.
Created using Phaser engine - first real worth game that we did:)

Inspiration and instruction for creation have been the next tutorial:
https://itnext.io/modular-game-worlds-in-phaser-3-tilemaps-5-matter-physics-plat...



https://github.com/taras-budzyn/game-once-on-the-moon

Please comment and left feedback what you think about this game:)
